messages.subject: Re: [SPAM] [nihontostudy] NSR - 2006 KTK catalogues available
messages.msgSnippet: And I was going to ask you for all the race results for the next six months Ron, oh well. Rich ... [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
messages.messageBody:
And I was going to ask you for all the race results for the next six
months Ron, oh well.

Rich

Ron Hartmann wrote:
>
> Good grief, life must be too hectic around here. It was pointed out to
> me that this is the 2006 KTK catalogue, not 2007 as I wrote! This is
> clear on the photos I referred to but please, be aware that it is the
> 2006 2nd convention of KTK catalogue.
>
> Sorry everyone...my careless error. (Thanks Andrew, for pointing this
> out to me.)
>
> Ron
> STL

messages.subject: NSR - 2006 KTK catalogues available
messages.msgSnippet: Good grief, life must be too hectic around here. It was pointed out to me that this is the 2006 KTK catalogue, not 2007 as I wrote! This is clear on the photos
messages.messageBody:
Good grief, life must be too hectic around here. It was pointed out to me that this is the 2006 KTK catalogue, not 2007 as I wrote! This is clear on the photos I referred to but please, be aware that it is the 2006 2nd convention of KTK catalogue.

Sorry everyone...my careless error. (Thanks Andrew, for pointing this out to me.)

Ron
STL

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
